pages.text: There's a more powerful version of the nesoberi base block called the $(bold)position zero$() block.$(br2)Your nesos charges faster while emitting a beacon light on it.

pages.name: School Idol Stage
pages.text: $(bold)Note:$() You must leave the at least 3 blocks of air above the field of school idol stage.

pages.title: Obtain Large Nesos
pages.text: To obtain a large version of your neso, put the $(bold)medium$() version of it on the $(#f88)position zero block$(), and put 8 other $(bold)medium$() nesos $(#0a0)around it$().$(br2)Let's define $(#08f)adjacency$():$(li)The $(#f88)position zero block$() is $(#08f)adjacent$() to the $(#0a0)8 blocks$() around it.$(li)A $(#0a0)neso base block$() is $(#08f)adjacent$() to the next $(#0a0)neso base block$(), clockwise or counterclockwise.

Arrange the other $(bold)medium$() nesos as follows:$(li)All nesos of the same $(bold)subunit$() must be $(#08f)adjacent$().$(li)All nesos of the same $(bold)grade (class)$() must be $(#08f)adjacent$().$(br2)Find more information about the subunits and grades from $(l:https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%A9%E3%83%96%E3%83%A9%E3%82%A4%E3%83%96!%E8%93%AE%E3%83%8E%E7%A9%BA%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%A6%E9%99%A2%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%BC%E3%83%AB%E3%82%A2%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%AB%E3%82%AF%E3%83%A9%E3%83%96)Wikipedia$().$(br2)After you're done, all medium nesos will merge into a large version of the centered neso - $(#f00)You won't get back the medium nesos!$()
